caption.p: Overall single radial hemolysis (SRH) antibody response for serum samples collected between 2017 and 2018 (all four French regions combined). SRH titers below the clinical protection threshold (>85 mm 2) are in red colors, titers above the clinical protection threshold are in light blue (85 mm 2 and <154 mm 2), titers above the clinical and virus shedding protection threshold (154 mm 2 and above) are in blue.
